name: Allamanda
description: A smaller variety of Yellow Bell with similar characteristics.

name: Bagawak-Morado
description: An ornamental flower with purple and white blooms.

name: Bauhinia
description: Known as the orchid tree flower, with delicate purple petals.

name: Bird of Paradise
description: An exotic flower resembling a bird in flight.

name: Bougainvillea
description: A decorative plant with bright, colorful bracts in pink, orange, or purple.

name: Dama de Noche
description: A night-blooming flower with a strong, sweet scent.

name: Dona Aurora
description: A star-shaped flower named after a Philippine First Lady.

name: Fire Tree Flowers
description: Bright red-orange blooms that stand out in summer.

name: Gumamela
description: A vibrant flower available in various colors like red, pink, and yellow.

name: Hoya
description: Waxy, star-shaped flowers also called 'wax flowers.'

name: Ilang-Ilang
description: Yellow-green flowers with a unique shape and a sweet, strong fragrance.

name: Kalachuchi
description: A tropical flower with white petals and a yellow center, often seen in gardens.

name: Katmon
description: Native white flowers with large, prominent stamens.

name: Katuray
description: Edible flowers used in traditional Filipino dishes.

name: Mimosa
description: Pink puffball flowers, also called 'Makahiya' due to their shy nature.

name: Palawan Cherry
description: Pink blooms similar to Japanese cherry blossoms.

name: Pasiflora
description: Passionflower with intricate and unique petals.

name: Rafflesia
description: The world's largest flower, known for its unique appearance and rarity.

name: Rosal
description: A fragrant flower with pure white petals, often used in perfumes.

name: Sampaguita
description: The national flower of the Philippines, known for its small white blooms and sweet fragrance.

name: Santan
description: Small, clustered flowers in shades of red, orange, or pink.

name: Tuberose
description: Highly fragrant white flowers often used in floral arrangements.

name: Waling-Waling
description: An orchid called the 'Queen of Philippine Orchids,' known for its striking purple and pink hues.

name: White Angel
description: Pinwheel-shaped flowers with a delicate white appearance.

name: Yellow Bell
description: Bright yellow trumpet-shaped flowers, common in tropical areas.
